description: When you create custom characters, Private Character editor saves both a ".tte" file and a ".euf" file. Both are used when re-editing the character set.
NOTE: The Private Character Editor program, eudcedit.exe , is located in the C:\​Windows\​System32\​ directory.

common_filenames.description: EUDC.tte - The file containing custom font information for characters edited in Private Character Editor.
